event.title: Saturday, February 14, 2009, when the attack happened

data.event: The teenager was walking through Ryelands Park in the city as she was making her way to a friendâ€™s house between 4am and 4.15am on Saturday, February 14, 2009, when the attack happened.

event.title: call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111, quoting log number 973 NQ of the 17 February

data.event: Anybody with any information should contact police on 01524 63333 or call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111, quoting log number 973 NQ of the 17 February.
